of stitches per repeat the steps in round brackets © 2022 love & stitch co all rights reserved autumnal acorns 4 of 5 1 acorn is constructed from bottom to top notes 2 work in continuous rounds without joining the round with a slip_stitch do not turn at the end of each round 3 use a stitch marker to keep track of the beginning of each round and move the marker up to the first stitch of the next round after finishing the previous one 4 i recommend using an invisible decrease to avoid forming a gap between the stitches 5 firmly stuff as you work and over stuff slightly before finishing this will allow the stuffing to fill out the shape after the crocheting is completed using the color a yarn begin with an magic_ring body round 1 4 single_crochet in magic_ring 4 round 2 increase in each st x 4 8 round 3 single_crochet increase x 4 12 round 4 2 single_crochet increase x 4 16 round 5 3 single_crochet increase x 4 20 round 6 9 single_crochet in each st around 20 top join and continue in color b yarn f/o color a yarn round 10 work in flo single_crochet increase x 10 30 round 11 single_crochet in each st around 30 round 12 single_crochet decrease x 10 20 round 13 decrease x 10 10 fill the acorn with fiberfill firmly round 14 single_crochet decrease decrease x 2 6 chain 9 working in the back bumps single_crochet in the second chain from the hook and in next 7 chs now work 5 sl sts in the front loops of round 14 f/o and weave in the end © 2022 love & stitch co all rights reserved autumnal acorns 5 of 5 thank you the pattern and images contained in
